lameonj.encoder.std

Interface Encoder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GenericEncoder, StreamEncoder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EncoderImpl, GenericEncoderImpl, StreamEncoderImpl, StreamEncoderPCMImpl, StreamEncoderWAVImpl

    public interface Encoder
    This object represents an encoding task. Is the base interface of the MP3 encoder object oriented API using the LAME standard API.

    LAME flags must be set up before any encoding task, if an encoding task was started the LAME configuration is freezed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes this encoder.
      EncoderConfig getEncoderConfig()
      Returns the LAME configuration object of this encoder.
      lame_global_flags getLameFlags()
      Returns the internal global flags object used by this encoder.
      boolean isClosed()
      Informs whether this encoder is closed.
      void writeVbrTag(java.lang.String mp3File)
      Writes the VBR tag info to the specified MP3 file.

    • Method Detail

      • getEncoderConfig

        EncoderConfig getEncoderConfig()
        Returns the LAME configuration object of this encoder.
        Returns:
        the LAME configuration object.

      • getLameFlags

        lame_global_flags getLameFlags()
        Returns the internal global flags object used by this encoder.
        Returns:
        the internal global flags object.

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Informs whether this encoder is closed.
        Returns:
        true if this enconder is closed.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes this encoder. A closed encoder cannot be reused.

      • writeVbrTag

        void writeVbrTag(java.lang.String mp3File)
        Writes the VBR tag info to the specified MP3 file.

        VBR tag info property must be enabled (see Lame.lame_set_bWriteVbrTag(lame_global_flags,int)) otherwise does nothing.

        The encoder must be open.

        Parameters:
        mp3File - the file path of the MP3 file.
